data: “Oh, what a perfectly lovely mummy! Just fancy!—the poor thing—dead how many years? Something like five thousand, isn’t it? And doesn’t she look just like me! I mean, wouldn’t she, if we had both been dead as long?”

"Oh, what a perfectly lovely mummy! Just fancy!--the poor thing--dead how many years? Something like five thousand, isn't it? And doesn't she look just like me! I mean, wouldn't she, if we had both been dead as long?"
The mummy and Miss Nitocris : a phantasy of the fourth dimension
